title: Oath of the Ancients
content: Divine Smite and all your Proficiencies to another Class, while by level 6 you would have Extra Attack and Aura of Protection, which are both fantastic. Because Heavy Armour does not scale AC to Dexterity in the same way Light and Medium Armour do, it can be viable to dump Dexterity and use Heavy Armour without worrying about taking a -1 penalty to AC at 8 DEX. However, bear in mind that your DEX will still affect Dexterity Saving Throws and Initiative rolls. Paladins in BG3 primarily use Chari
